entity.name: COVID-19: Public health updates
entity.description: Information on how to take care of yourself and others from authorities and public officials.

text:
Reports suggesting student nurses & midwives are being made redundant are false.
 
All students who have worked as part of the Covid19 response have been paid & will be until the end of the summer.
 
Thank you to every student for supporting the NHS at this difficult time

More🔽
